translations.A place for activist and community proje: 活動家和社區項目建立共享知識的地方
translations.Collectives is a Nextcloud App for activ:
知識庫是一款供活動家與社群專案共同整理的 Nextcloud 應用程式。
聚在一起，建立共享知識。

* 👥 **知識庫與無層級工作流程的核心**：知識庫與 [Nextcloud 團隊](https://github.com/nextcloud/circles)緊密相連並由知識庫擁有。
* 📝 **協作頁面編輯** 歸功於[文字應用程式](https://github.com/nextcloud/text)，這就如同 Etherpad 一般。
* 🔤 用於格式化頁面的**眾所周知的 [Markdown](https://zh.wikipedia.org/wiki/Markdown) 語法**

## 安裝

在您的 Nextcloud 實例中，只要到**»應用程式«**找到**»團隊«**與**»知識庫«**應用程式並啟用它們。

translations.Created collective \"%s\" for existing c: 為現有社交圈子創建知識庫 “%s”。
translations.A share for collective %s exists already: 知識庫 %s的分享已經存在
translations.Collectives is a Nextcloud App for activ:
Collectives is a Nextcloud App for activist and community projects to organize together.
Come and gather in collectives to build shared knowledge.

* 👥 **Collective and non-hierarchical workflow by heart**: Collectives are
  tied to a [Nextcloud Circle](https://github.com/nextcloud/circles) and
  owned by the collective.
* 📝 **Collaborative page editing** like known from Etherpad thanks to the
  [Text app](https://github.com/nextcloud/text).
* 🔤 **Well-known [Markdown](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Markdown) syntax**
  for page formatting.

## Installation

In your Nextcloud instance, simply navigate to **»Apps«**, find the
**»Circles«** and **»Collectives«** apps and enable them.
translations.The contacts app is required to manage m: 需要通訊錄應用程式來管理成員

translations.Members can be managed via the connected: 成員可以通過聯繫人應用程式中的社交圈子進行管理。
translations.Open circle in Contacts: 在通訊錄中開啟社交圈子
